___spark-executor-docker-image.description: Name of the docker image to be used for Spark.

___spark-executor-memory.description: Memory to allocate to the Spark executor.

___spark-max-executors.description: Maximum number of executors for Spark.

___external_access.description:
Enable access from outside the cluster through Marathon-LB.
NOTE: this connection is unencrypted.

___virtual_host.description: For external access, Virtual Host URL to be used in Marathon-LB.

___external_access_port.description: For external access, port number to be used for clear communication in Marathon-LB.

___enable.description: Enable or disable creating a VIP for external access through a public node running Marathon-LB.

___spark-driver-memory.description: Memory to allocate to the Spark driver.

___host_path.description: Path in the host to be used for temporary storage

___mem.description: Memory to allocate to each service instance.

___spark-cores-max.description: Maximum number of cores to allocate to Spark.

___spark-executor-cores.description: Maximum number of cores to allocate to the Spark executor.

___instances.description: Number of service instances to run in the cluster.

___spark-mesos-extra-cores.description: Extra cores for Spark on Mesos.

___port.description: TCP port for the Spark Thrift Server service

___cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each service instance.
